name: py-xarray-tensorstore

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
Xarray-TensorStore is a small library that allows opening Zarr arrays
into Xarray via TensorStore, instead of the standard Zarr-Python
library.

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-tensorstore
dependencies.description: Read and write large, multi-dimensional arrays.

dependencies.name: py-xarray
dependencies.description: N-D labeled arrays and datasets in Python

dependencies.name: py-zarr
dependencies.description:
Zarr is a Python package providing an implementation of chunked,
compressed, N-dimensional arrays.

dependencies.name: python-venv
dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment

dependent_to.name: py-dinosaur
dependent_to.description: Dinosaur: differentiable dynamics for global atmospheric modeling.
